description: If you have a whole lot of free time this weekend I've got just the ticket: a Steam Free Weekend for Crusader Kings III and some discounts across other Paradox titles.
title: Crusader Kings III gets a Free Weekend plus a big Paradox sale on Steam

description: Developer melessthanthree has today released the Randomizer update for Death of a Wish, which amongst new features brings in Native Linux support.
title: Death of a Wish gets Linux support with the Randomizer update out now

description: The weekend is approaching and if you're once again in need of some new games, check out the new Metroidvania Mania Humble Bundle.
title: The Metroidvania Mania Humble Bundle has some delightful treats inside

description: Airships: Lost Flotilla is a fun looking spin-off from the much loved Airships: Conquer the Skies developed by David Stark. A demo is available right now!
title: Airships: Lost Flotilla is a rad steampunk autoshooter - dev talks Linux / Steam Deck support

description: What if you took a bit of Stardew Valley but you're a Vampire rudely awoken from a deep 500 year nap and now you have to deal with capitalism? That's your problem in Brocula.
title: Sink your teeth into capitalism after a 500-year slumber in Brocula out now

description: As a huge fan of all things Gundam (I've seen every series and movie there is), I am ridiculously looking forward to GUNDAM BREAKER 4 and now it has an actual release date.
title: GUNDAM BREAKER 4 releases August 29th

description: After recently releasing an update adding in trains and working doors, Vampire Survivors: Operation Guns is officially out now with plenty of extra content to play through.
title: Contra crossover Vampire Survivors: Operation Guns DLC out now
